title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“Now for 24 hours a day, I can sleep, swim and be completely active!” [An ad for hair replacement, from The New York Times 19 August 1984. Submitted by Rosemary Darmstadt, Glendale, New York.]
